Many Glaciers Fireplace

I was amazed how well the fireplace hood worked. The one we made for the cabin smoked like crazy. We cut it up and turned it into a planter.

Swiftcurrent Lake

A mountain view south from Many Glaciers Logde over Swiftcurrent Lake.

Many Glaciers Lodge

This is the south wing of the lodge. We stayed in the room one from the end with a deck looking at the camera. We didn't have a view of the lake, instead we had a great view of the mountains.

Mount Grinnell

Mount Grinnel is right across the lake from the lodge.

Mount Henkel

We walked around Swiftcurrent Lake and Lake Josephine. They are connected with a slow moving river. That is where this picture was taken.

Moose Land

We saw a moose on the far side of the lake and Kathleen filmed it.

Lake Trail

This is a trail around the lakes near the Many Glaciers Lodge.

Two Red Rocks

The two red rocks are having a great time playing and sliding down the hill into the river. They’re living at a time scale that’s hard for us to imagine. We saw two other red rocks swimming in the lake but I didn’t get a picture of that.
